snippet: The Giants’ second-half swoons under Tom Coughlin have been well chronicled. Still, the coach weathered it all to lead the team to the N.F.C. East title.
abstract: Analysis; New York Giants coach Tom Coughlin has weathered the ups and downs of the season, the scrutiny and speculation about his future by both the press and the fans, and has led his team to the NFC East title.
lead_paragraph: The Giants’ second-half swoons under Tom Coughlin have been well chronicled. Still, the coach weathered it all to lead the team to the N.F.C. East title.

headline.seo: Giants’ Coach Tom Coughlin Set in Ways, Because They Work
headline.main: Coughlin Is Set in His Ways, Because They Work
headline.print_headline: Coach Set In Ways, Because They Work
